lenders.name: Bairbre

lenders.name: Hannah
lenders.loan_because: I believe it contributes to self esteem, self responsibility, and ultimately to world peace.

lenders.name: wolfgang

lenders.name: Bill & Mary

I think it is important to have self sufficient societies consisting of contributing citizens.  

"Learn as if you were going to live forever.  Live as if you were going to die tomorrow."  Mahatma Gandhi
lenders.occupational_info: Bill provides office furniture and supplies to corporate customers throughout the U.S.  Mary works in Human Resources and employee relations

lenders.name: BikeParts.com
lenders.loan_because: i want to help others succeed
lenders.occupational_info: making the world a better place one bicycle at a time

lenders.name: Barb
lenders.loan_because: I was given $100 from my church as part of the "Kingdom Assignment" and was told to do something with the money of my choice to further God's kingdom. I thought of Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: I perform administrative task for the human resource department of my place of employment.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: it's easy and can make a difference to the life of someone else.

lenders.name: linda
lenders.loan_because: I'm blessed.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to help youths make better decisions about the law.

lenders.name: Kitty
lenders.loan_because: All of us have needed a helping hand in our lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist. I also find money  for organizations who help other people (Grant writing for non-profit organizations)

lenders.name: Ralph T.
lenders.loan_because: I want to reach out and help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Harry
lenders.loan_because: I really do not know
lenders.occupational_info: 14 hrs a day in front of a computer

lenders.name: Cesar
lenders.loan_because: I feel that is the right thing to do. I am originally from Peru, and I have seen the poverty in my country. I am fortunate that I had parents who provided everything to me. I'm also privileged that I received an education in another country. I'm always thankful to God for everything I have. Thus, by making donations to people in need who have businesses, they can have a better chance to fulfill their dreams. Sometimes, those of us who have everything complain about the price of gas, our job, etc. However, we forget that other people in other countries wish they had even the left overs we had for dinner. Helping others is part of being human. It helps us to grow as people. Kiva is one way to help others, and it's a reminder that we are here to serve others, and not be served.

lenders.name: Sweetie Cake
lenders.loan_because: the opportunity to directly help someone is the real gift.

lenders.name: Joseph Fowble
lenders.occupational_info: I am a graduate student in a malaria research lab.  We try to understand the parasite in the hopes of developing new drugs to combat resistance.

lenders.name: Adele
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of sharing across man-made boundaries.
lenders.occupational_info: After many years as a practicing accountant, I have returned to graduate school to become a teacher.

lenders.name: steve
lenders.loan_because: do my part to make the world a better place
lenders.occupational_info: grocery store owner

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the philosophy of "planting a seed", and watching it grow!
lenders.occupational_info: I provide transportation for executive clients when they visit Seattle.

lenders.loan_because: I want to help

lenders.name: The Angle Family
lenders.loan_because: We like to help people help themselves

lenders.name: Gaute Haug Eriksen

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.loan_because: I can and because people need a little help to help themselves.

lenders.name: Lydia

lenders.occupational_info:
I look after 110 children and ten teachers in a childcare in a school.
The children are the reason for my job.

lenders.name: Renee
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide people with information so they can make decisions that are in their best interests.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I think we all need to do what we can with what we've got. It's great to think that a small loan can make a big difference in someone's life.  This will hopefully (in a small way) help to create a better, more peaceful world
lenders.occupational_info: I am a transportation planner.

lenders.name: laura
lenders.loan_because: great way to helps others less fortunate, who are in need and work hard.

lenders.name: Lori

lenders.occupational_info: I teach university students how to create media such as radio shows, news, and web pages.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: At Christmas I got lots that I needed and my mom said why not share, so I am using my money to share.  My favorite projects are little children and animals.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an elementary school student in the Canadian Arctic, but right now my family is travelling to see the world.

lenders.name: Mario

lenders.name: Grace
lenders.loan_because: There is no other way to help these people than to give them the opportunity to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Just feels good

lenders.name: Blair
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people

lenders.name: Dale
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of making a difference in an individual's life.  Families making a decent income are more likely to educate their children, and I believe that education is the best way to end poverty, ignorance and violence.  KIVA is a fun way to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm fortunate to have reached the age where my "work" is to enjoy my life, and that's easy work.  I draw and paint, read, travel and walk with my beautiful spaniel, Toffee.

lenders.name: Erin and Tom

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good.

lenders.name: Gary and Angela

lenders.name: Sarah Jane
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: Doing what I can to help myself and others

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: It's pretty simple - the majority of the world's wealth is concentrated in a small group of people. It's a moral obligation to share - well done Kiva for setting up the mechanism.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage web projects - helping businesses build, run and grow their websites.

lenders.name: Nicholas
lenders.loan_because: I want to double as much light as I can, and I admire the spirit of every entrepreneur I read about on Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a product design studio.

lenders.name: Stapleton Family
lenders.loan_because: we can!
lenders.occupational_info: Every Christmas we pool together some money we otherwise would have spent on each other and give it to those who need it more - Kiva was it in 2007!

lenders.name: Dennis & Marilyn
lenders.loan_because:
People who will work to build a life for themselves are a precious resource for the world
It is a small amount of money in Canadian funds but can make a real difference in someone else's life.
lenders.occupational_info: Both retired. Dennis started out as a school teacher, Marilyn a medical secretary. Then we became a growers of flowers, trees &  shrubs. Finally, we both worked in job training programs & supporting people with disabilities.

lenders.name: Loni
lenders.loan_because: I have so much and want to share some part of what I have with others.

lenders.occupational_info: I write about major league baseball.

lenders.name: kristin
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance at equality, social justice, and self-determination
lenders.occupational_info: I am a medical worker and educator

lenders.occupational_info: We work on computers, designing programs, presentations, brochures, etc.

lenders.name: David

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: This is a terrific way to create "real" opportunity for those with ambition and desire to better their fortune. You are able to connect with specific people and truly make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a sales and marketing consultant specializing in helping companies create and capture demand for their products and services.

lenders.name: Janet

lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference in peoples lives

lenders.name: Pat
lenders.loan_because: I need to help those whose lives can be elevated by such help.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I have been retired for many years.  This means that we can live comfortably without working because our work of many years ago provided the money that we use today to live on.

lenders.name: Grace, Sam & Heidi H
lenders.loan_because: My mom thinks it's a good idea and my aunt got us Kiva Gift Certificates for Christmas
lenders.occupational_info: Just being kids: playing, getting messy, eating, going to school, being loved by mom and dad.

lenders.name: Kellie
lenders.occupational_info: Kellie teaches Writing at the University of Washington, and also works as an editor for Amazon.com.

lenders.name: Erika
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great opportunity to help someone willing to work hard to give their family a better life.  I particularly enjoy lending to female entrepreneurs around the world as they frequently have less opportunities than men but the most ambition to provide for their children.

lenders.name: JUAN
lenders.occupational_info: no comments for now ,

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: Kiva offers an opportunity to begin breaking the cycle of poverty by helping others help themselves (and in-turn to help others through job creation)
lenders.occupational_info: Run a business that manufactures electronic equipment for measuring electric power consumption and various characteristics of electricity.

lenders.name: Monica
lenders.occupation: Sr. Account Manager at a Translation Company
lenders.loan_because: I got tired of waiting for the world to change and I feel it is time to take action.

lenders.name: Mark & Sue
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.  Maybe one by one, the world can become a better place.  It's cool to join with such a fine organization as Kiva and participate with all these other individuals to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Sue works with websites and Mark works with customer accounts.

lenders.name: Oz Toraman
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves the same opportunities I have been afforded

lenders.name: The Fullers
lenders.loan_because: We are doing this as a family.  Our 2 preschool children have each picked a individual to lend some of their own money to.  They are excited and are learning alot about the world and helping people.  This is a great learning experience for them a great way to help those in need.

lenders.name: Chen
lenders.loan_because: contribute to growing entrepreneurs
lenders.occupational_info: Help build better business leaders

lenders.name: Xavier
lenders.loan_because: because it connects me with people mostly.  But to be more specific it connects me with other chefs around the world following their passion.  And for that I am happy to loan money to someone following their dream ethically.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a sous chef at a Greek and American cusisne restaraunt.  It seats over 500 people and is a challenge that I enjoy taking on everyday.  I aspire to make great food for hungry persons by creating, leading, and learning with other chefs.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people who have a vision and hope for a better future
lenders.occupational_info: I work with special needs kids in school, and with all kids in a classroom

lenders.name: Jack & Jane
lenders.loan_because: It's great to be a part of the Kiva team and to help people help themselves as they in turn help others!

lenders.name: Tim & Ariel
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference wherever I can, while setting an example for my daughter and her future endeavors..
lenders.occupational_info: I am an information technology manager for a financial institution.  My daughter is a high school student.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I think it is just the best way to support people less fortunate than myself. It is amazing what such a small sacrifice on my behalf means to someone else.

lenders.name: Chuck & Beth
lenders.occupation: Chuck - Equip Operator/Beth - MNR Fire Management
lenders.loan_because: We have so much - there is a moral obligation to share and help others.  We are all in this world together and together we can make it a better place for everyone.
lenders.occupational_info: Chuck works away from  home in northern Alberta because there is no work near where we live.  He flies north, is there for 2 weeks and then flies home to be with the family for a week.  It is difficult to be away from home, but we are fortunate he has a job he likes with people he likes.  Beth works for the Ministry of Natural Resources Forest Fire Management Center.

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because: Its a great way to help those in areas where there is very little help available.

lenders.name: Ted
lenders.loan_because: It is an excellent way to assist someone less fortunate than myself using limited resources.

lenders.name: Debra
lenders.loan_because: I have witnessed the difficulties faced in third world countries and the difference we can make in their quality of life.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach sewing and quilting with  missionary teams.  This skill has given many women the ability to  improve their economic situation.

lenders.name: Anne and Maurice
lenders.loan_because: it is important to help one another.

lenders.name: Charlie and Kit
lenders.occupational_info: Kit is an Anesthesiologist in Denver and Charlie brews craft beer that is enjoyed locally!

lenders.name: Miguel
lenders.loan_because: No tengo mucho, pero si puedo ayudar a alguien que tiene mucho menos que yo... ESO me hace feliz!

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: I believe in  people all over the world who are working to make a better life for themselves and their children. I want to empower them just as people empowered me when I needed it most. And I get so much back just from being part of this program.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm just one little person wanting to be part of a international network of giving and receiving. This program makes my heart SING.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: it just feels right.
lenders.occupational_info: Semi retired

lenders.name: Nirav Patel
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: Hotel Investor

lenders.name: Jamie
lenders.loan_because: Livelihoods are more important than trinkets.
lenders.occupational_info: I help find and propose new housing developments, and work on submissions for government funding.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: It can make someone's life better.
lenders.occupational_info: I reproduce artwork using a computer. I also print for tradeshow booths.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Charisse
lenders.loan_because: it's a great feeling to lend to people that truly need it and will make a difference in their life.

lenders.name: Peggy & Bob
lenders.loan_because: Our good friends gave us a gift certificate for Christmas and told us about KIVA.  What a wonderful idea!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach speech and language skills in an elementary school and my husband, Bob, is a high school English teacher.

lenders.name: Carol Ruby
lenders.loan_because: i like to see creativity and effort grow with encouragement.  This is an effective way to have people better their lives through their own efforts.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people make and clarify their ideas for visual communication using computers & software as a tool.

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because:
My Mother , Mary Anne, inspired our involvement in Kiva by listening to a story on NPR about an Afghan Baker. She wanted to help women with children with the desire to help themselves. I 
continue her vision and have kept her words." I am 
pleased to lend a helping hand to someone who wants to give their family a better life through their 
own hard work and initiative. I have always been 
interested in helping children grow and learn and 
want to connect with people who have that in 
common with me."
lenders.occupational_info: Life is hard. I am inspired by the people who get up each morning in hard situations and continue to carry on. If $25.00 is the difference between success and failure, its a small price.

lenders.name: Caroline
lenders.loan_because: I believe it makes a difference.

lenders.name: Lorraine
lenders.loan_because: I was impressed and moved by the Kiva piece I saw on PBS.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a preschool and help children learn to function to the best of their physical abilities.  I cherish the children I work with and am very proud of even the most minor of accomplishments.

lenders.name: Juan & Sonja
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we are blessed with so much from our Lord Jesus Christ ourselfs that we not dare to keep it all for ourselfs!!

lenders.name: sandra
lenders.loan_because: It is a fabulous idea to help generate independence in areas that need the extra boost.

lenders.name: Francis
lenders.loan_because: I CAN

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky enough to have been born in a wealthy, caring & amazing country, New Zealand ...

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.loan_because: it takes so little of my personal budget to make an impact on another's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a responsibility to share what I have been given with those that have so little opportunity in their lives.

lenders.name: Michael and family
lenders.loan_because: My siblings and I have been blessed with much good fortune.  In lieu of buying Christmas gifts for each other, we pool the money we would have spent and loan it to aspiring entrepreneurs--may they, too, find fortune!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired university administrator.   I managed the various offices that help students gain admission to the university and assist them in their pursuit of a university degree.  I now spend my time with causes that matter to me--Kiva and Habitat for Humanity among them.

lenders.name: In Memory of Wendy
lenders.loan_because: I care about families and know that just a wee bit of help can make a big difference.  I donate to Kiva in memory of Wendy Shearer, the best teacher, mentor and friend in the world.  Wendy, as you helped me, I hope my donations will help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher in Jacksonville, Florida.

lenders.name: Lynda
lenders.loan_because: After traveling around and visiting 3rd world countries, I know that my loan is going to help someone that is in need of a helping hand.  It is in a small way, my part to help someone feel better about themselves and to hopefully make a difference in their lives.

lenders.name: Mina
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Gail
lenders.loan_because: It's like putting money in a bank that pays in human interest instead of monetary interest.

lenders.name: The Squires Family
lenders.loan_because: Our purpose in life is to make an impact on people however we are able.  Providing micro-finance loans allows me and my family to personally impact people across the globe.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell business software that helps people manage their maintenance and operations more effectively.

lenders.name: Carla
lenders.loan_because: because i believe a little can go a long way
lenders.occupational_info: looking at strategies to reduce unsafe sex and risky alcohol use.

lenders.name: Tom and June
lenders.loan_because: God has been extremely good to us.  Kiva.org is a great way for us to give back to God's people in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Tom managed a water supply and distribution agency in Southern California.

lenders.name: Luger Family
lenders.loan_because:
I am of the opinion that my life belongs to the community, and as long as I live it is my privilege to do for it whatever I can.

George Bernard Shaw

lenders.name: David and Sandy
lenders.loan_because: This seems to be a very simple practical way to support people in countries where credit for basic businesses is difficult to find. We see it as a way to support families in increasing there own ability to improve their lives and the well being of their community. It is a way for us to give to others with the hope that they too will be able to give somewhere in the future.
lenders.occupational_info: Sandy is a retired teacher and I am a retired civil servant. We support tis kind of practical giving.

lenders.name: Banks
lenders.loan_because: I want to learn about the World!

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance at success!  My older sister introduced our family to KIVA with a gift certificate at Christmas.
lenders.occupational_info: I approve loans to families so they can buy a home.

lenders.name: The VonKrosigks
lenders.loan_because: A chance to help someone improve their life.
lenders.occupational_info: manufacturing computer chips

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to better themselves and the lives of their family through opportunity.  My family has been given opportunities due to hard work, the grace of God, generosity of others and luck.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children and families to help them handle difficult circumstances in their life.

lenders.name: Ariel & Winter
lenders.loan_because: We can and we care.

lenders.name: Laura and John
lenders.loan_because: we want to help others the way we have been helped throughout our life.

lenders.loan_because: We have a daughter  we adopted from Guatemala.  We loan to try to give back to that beautiful country.
lenders.occupational_info: Computer management for me. Therapy and at home mom for her.

lenders.name: Ingomar
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea and prevents me from spending the money on crap ;-)

lenders.name: danijel
lenders.loan_because: i want to help those who are less fortunate than myself

lenders.name: Brooke
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of the human community to overcome the smallest and greatest obstacles. I believe in putting positive energy and efforts out into the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in school for advanced training in psychology -- I love helping people feel better about themselves and be inspired to fulfill their potential.

lenders.name: Gorgeous and Green
lenders.loan_because: We want to give back where we can, and help entrepreneurs in other countries make their own destiny.

lenders.name: Josara
lenders.loan_because: we are all in it together
lenders.occupational_info: I am involved in the study and management of Australia's Aboriginal and historical cultural heritage

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: it can make a difference

lenders.name: David & Septimia (mom)
lenders.loan_because:
I wasn't going to spend my $50 that I received for Christmas so I thought to lend them. I like cows so I lended to somebody who wanted to raise cows. - David 
"Richer the one who gives." but also because I know that when you help a mother get ahead her children too will move ahead. Unfortunately, in some parts of the world women have little opportunities and rights. Let us, empowered mothers, help our less fortunate sisters!   -  mom
lenders.occupational_info:
I go to school (7th grade). - David
I work in an office. - mom

lenders.name: Larry and Jane

My Husband and I recently make a company named Urban & Green Co. of real estate and we like to develop a Green City in Panama and make all the construction certified by LEED standards.
First of all we need to buy a software for a webpage to marketing the project and it cost USD 1,000.00 and we need sponsors and colaborations of people involved in the conservation of nature to educate the people.

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: I can!   I certainly don't have a lot of extra money, but to think that I can lend as little as $25 and that it can make such a difference in another person's life blows me away.  This is the ultimate 'Pay It Forward'!!!
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I run a small marina and cottage resort on Eels Lake  Ontario, Canada.  We rent cottages, boats, sell outboard motors, run a general store and provide a variety of services to over 400 private cottages on our lake.

lenders.name: Terry
lenders.loan_because: For me, it is a question of stewardship.  I can not imagine a better way to put these resources to work.  It is incredible that this contribution renews itself and that we gain a glimpse into how it impacts lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am this generation's blacksmith.

lenders.name: Jenny
lenders.loan_because: Our world is so much smaller than I ever thought. Each of us are connected in many ways and it is a joy to have the opportunity to invest in the success of others.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I want to make an impact in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an assistant manager at a public market and I also work at a smoothie shop. I work seven days a week to help support my mother and little brother.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I like to share my good fortune in life and help out my brothers and sisters around the world.  Let there be peace and bounty for all people!!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in rural Alaska on trails related issues out of an outreach office of the National Park Service in Anchorage, Alaska.  I work in local communities with native people to help support their traditional subsistence way of life.

lenders.name: matthew
lenders.loan_because: this is a great way to help others who really need it.
lenders.occupational_info: i am age 16 and go to high school. I go there from seven thirty in the morning until three in the afternoon.

lenders.name: Elba
lenders.loan_because: I would like to empower people in need to be able to grow and have a better life for themselves and their families...I plan to continue this association for many years to come!
lenders.occupational_info: I have recently moved to Spain to live near my daughter and grandchildren...I am so enjoying this new chapter in my life!!!

lenders.name: Matt & Ashley
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: Its just great to help people. But its even better to help more than one person/family with the same money
lenders.occupational_info: Fair.

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: I donate because I want to help others. Hopefully my feeble attempts will help to make life a little easier and pleasant for these, whom I consider, special people.
lenders.occupational_info: I work part time at a school district.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I want to support woman in businesses. It's a tough world out there, so why not? I love the so very anti-corporate aspect of this. It's very refreshing and it's win/win. The pictures and stories make this so personal.

lenders.name: Meredith
lenders.loan_because: Otherwise, I'd spend the money on clothes. This is far more fulfilling.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: it opens access to needed resources that these motivated people would not otherwise have. It helps them to provide the necessities of life to their families.  Lending in this fashion promotes self esteem, independence, and adds wealth to the recipient's community.  In general, it takes small steps towards fostering equality between people, rich and poor.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I love entrepreneurship, and I believe that most people deserve the breaks they get--and more.
lenders.occupational_info: I help my company invent new, better ways of doing things to make our services more valuable to our customers.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: People in need, NEED. When I was down, and in some need, one person came forward to my aid. I want to "Pay It Forward" THANK YOU, Brandi, for for your good will,so I can pass it on...
lenders.occupational_info: I am a 12 hr. per day shift worker in the advanced circuit  materials manufacturing field. I'm lucky now, but wasn't always. This is my thanks to those who helped me.

lenders.name: Adrienne
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to support people who are making their lives work.

lenders.name: Iris W
lenders.loan_because: ... it is a beautiful idea.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and develop websites. I love what I do and am grateful for the good life I have.

lenders.name: Charlie the Scholar
lenders.loan_because: My sister gave me a gift certificate and the person I loaned to repaid her loan.  To add to her success, I have loaned to more people.
lenders.occupational_info: Working with children with developmental delays and their families.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: As a charity fundraiser I know the challenges of trying to fund the needs of those who need assistance.  I love the concept of Kiva and how we can affect the lives of those around the world as we lend to those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise funds and solicit volunteer involvement for a Not for Profit senior living community.

lenders.name: LaVonna
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in others lives... and the truth is it makes me feel good about myself as well.. a win/win all around.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: I am very well traveled and i have seen first hand how much we can impact others around the world.  I work to make money, i take some money and give it to another person across the globe.  It feels like i gave a little bit of labor to help their business.
lenders.occupational_info: I do two things for work.  2 days a week i work as a mechanic.  5 Days a week i sell mens suits.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I loan so I can help someone to do better and have an opportunity for success.  I have been homeless and lived in poverty, and I hated it so I feel that I should do something to help others get out of poverty.

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people in the developing world raise their standard of living.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to be a software developer but am now retired.

lenders.name: Irma
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people, weather it is through my work or financial support. I feel very fortunate where I get to live & I want others to have a better life too.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people feel better by Massaging away stress, tension & aches & pains in their bodies.  :)

lenders.name: Susan & Chas
lenders.loan_because: In Canada we have plenty and peace. Kiva gives us a real opportunity to share our good fortune directly with another person. We know that people cannot choose where they are born and we were most fortunate to be born here. Helping others in this way feels real and useful.
lenders.occupational_info: Susan has an online clothing company in Canada and Chas is a retired machinist and carpenter.

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: Business and Property consultant

lenders.name: The Burr Family
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can.  I have worked hard to raise my family as a single mom.  I know how difficult it can be.  I was fortunate to have people who believed in me. It gave me hope. It helped me be successful. I want to share that with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on the internet helping companies succeed in their online businesses.  I'm very good at it and I like doing it very much.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I believe we all are better when we all are better.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people feel better about themselves.

lenders.name: Saskia and Sherry
lenders.loan_because: We are all one, and we all need support.

lenders.name: Vija
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to help those motivated to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a flight attendant on a commercial airline.

lenders.name: cherise
lenders.loan_because: because we are fortunate enough to be able too, we like to make a difference when we can. we want to help those who are trying to help themselves

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I give to those less fortunate than myself, my mother taught me to do what is good.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: We're all in this together.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a nonprofit organization that encourages renewable energy projects (mostly wind power) in the Northwest corner of the US.  My job is to explain to power companies and government agencies why this is a good idea, and how the power system can work with lots of wind on it.
